fusionlibrary.fusion_models.tabular_decisionÔÉÅ

Decision fusion of two types of tabular data.

Classes

ParentFusionModel(pred_type,¬†data_dims,¬†params)

Parent class for all fusion models.

TabularDecision(pred_type,¬†data_dims,¬†params)

This class implements a model that fuses the two types of tabular data using a decision fusion
class fusionlibrary.fusion_models.tabular_decision.TabularDecision(pred_type, data_dims, params)[source]ÔÉÅ

Bases: ParentFusionModel, Module

This class implements a model that fuses the two types of tabular data using a decision fusion

approach.

fusion_typeÔÉÅ

Type of fusion to be performed.

Type:

str

modality_typeÔÉÅ

Type of modality to be fused.

Type:

str

method_nameÔÉÅ

Name of the method.

Type:

str

mod1_layersÔÉÅ

Dictionary containing the layers of the 1st type of tabular data.

Type:

dict

mod2_layersÔÉÅ

Dictionary containing the layers of the 2nd type of tabular data.

Type:

dict

fused_layersÔÉÅ

Sequential layer containing the fused layers.

Type:

nn.Sequential

final_predictionÔÉÅ

Sequential layer containing the final prediction layers.

Type:

nn.Sequential

forward(x)[source]ÔÉÅ

Forward pass of the model.

forward(x)[source]ÔÉÅ

Forward pass of the model.

Parameters:

x (list) ‚Äì List containing the two types of tabular data.

Returns:

List containing the fused prediction.

Return type:

list
